title: Links der Isar - rechts der Spree

sources.title: 1940 Links Der Isar Rechts Der Spree( Hans Adalbert Von Schlettow, Fritz Genschow, Grethe Weiser, Hilde Sessak)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1940. Links der Isar-Rechts der Spree.  U.a mit Hans Adalbert von Schletow,Grethe Weiser und Fritz Genschow

metadata.Plot: When Anni (from Munich) and Alfred (from Berlin) decide to marry her father, true to the latent animosities between the north and south of Germany, blatantly refuses his consent. It's a tough task for both families to make him reconsider.
metadata.Actors: Fritz Kampers, Leo Peukert, Charlotte Schellhorn
